main event: A UFO was observed over Middletown, New York, displaying an orange-reddish glow and oscillating behavior over a period of two hours.
interesting points: The object oscillated and flashed during the observation,The UFO was described to be approximately 15 to 30 feet in diameter,Several witnesses, including civilians and children, reported seeing a bright object with spinning lights,The object changed direction abruptly, taking on the size of a basketball at one point,Despite thorough analysis, there was insufficient evidence to determine if the object was extraterrestrial in origin.
sighted object: An object with an orange-reddish glow, which oscillated, pulsated, and flashed.
witness description: Civilians in the area, including children.
